birthday_person.name: rami
birthday_person.appearance: looks younger than his real age

1982.content: tzahal - totchanim, sivta, meteoralog, then lebanon

1984.content: tzahal - moved to comupting unit in ramat aviv (?)

1985.content: tadinran marachot miede in givat shmueal as vms operator

1986.content: start economics ba stuadies in TAU, moved ramat aviv rented apartment, start job @ tekemm

1987.content: picked up by a fishing ship, moved to tel aviv, ivn gvirol, close to kastel

1988.content: moved to bnei dan apartment, started working in digital

1993.content: met his amazing wife (Daniela) with whom he got to grow old moved to herzelia

1995.content: At the time of Rabin's murder, Rami was windsurfing in Sinai

1996.content: the magnificent wedding with the love of his heart

1997.content: a big trip with his wife in the USA

1998.content: Birth of his eldest son and King Tomer!

2000.content: birth of his second son Dan!

2011.content: Affection and beneficial use of the beloved insect "black soldier" (grown fly) begins

2012.content: Purchases a bread machine for the first time which changes his life and the life of his family. In addition, that year he began to pass on the legacy and teach his children to windsurf.

2013.content: celebrates his 50th birthday with his wife at the Caremi Hotel

2014.content: adopted the love of his heart - his dog Pushkin

2016.content: family trip to the east coast of the United States

2019.content: for the first time watching a series with a full length of 7 seasons, after all it is Game of Thrones

2020.content: Started entering the ice cream making industry

2022.content: begins to be interested in unidentified objects "UFOs"

2023.content: separated from his beloved father Yitzhak

family_members.greeting: Congratulations!!!wish  that you will continue inventing intersting things for your self. improve the compost in the garden and in general  very Good health and life

family_members.name: noa
family_members.greeting: Happy birthday, Rami! I'm eagerly anticipating the entire family gathering for a skiing trip.

family_members.name: gaya
family_members.greeting: Happy birthday Rami, you're the best, Sixty years strong, and you stand out from the rest.  You share your crypto smarts, making it clear, Talking with you is always a joy, my dear.  Thanks for being patient, kind, and so wise, In sixty years, you've been quite the prize.  Here's to more talks, laughter, and stories untold, Happy birthday, Uncle Rami, worth more than gold!

family_members.name: ilay
family_members.greeting: Happy 60th birthday, May this milestone be a celebration of the incredible journey you've had so far, filled with joy, love, and unforgettable moments. May the years ahead be just as amazing, bringing you more happiness and fulfillment. Cheers to a wonderful cousin and the many adventures yet to come!
